trans-unit.source: Fixes the address of a static value type field throughout its lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 在静态值类型字段的整个生存期内固定其地址。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute> attribute to mark static value types as pinned upon creation.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute>特性来标记静态值类型标记为在创建时固定。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is used by the Microsoft Visual C++ compiler.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Visual c + + 编译器通过使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Static value type fields are created as boxed objects.
trans-unit.target: 静态值类型字段创建为装箱的对象。

trans-unit.source: This means that their address can change as garbage collection is performed.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着执行垃圾回收时，可以更改其地址。

trans-unit.source: When you apply this attribute to a static value type, its address remains constant during its lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性应用于静态值类型时，其地址保持不变在其生存期内。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute> attribute to pin a static field in memory.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute>固定在内存中的静态字段的属性。

trans-unit.source: It defines an `Age` structure and initializes two classes that have static fields of type `Age`.
trans-unit.target: 它定义`Age`结构，并初始化具有静态字段的类型的两个类`Age`。

trans-unit.source: The second class applies <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute> to pin the field's address.
trans-unit.target: 第二个类适用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute>固定该字段的地址。

trans-unit.source: A number of memory allocations are made before and after these two objects are instantiated and the garbage collector is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 之前和之后这两个对象实例化并调用垃圾回收器进行大量的内存分配。

trans-unit.source: The output from the example shows that although the address of the first `Age` field has changed after garbage collection, the address of the field to which <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute> is applied has not.
trans-unit.target: 示例输出显示，但第一个地址`Age`垃圾回收之后，向其字段的地址已更改字段<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute>应用是否没有。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute> attribute to pin a static field in memory.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute>固定在内存中的静态字段的属性。

trans-unit.source: It defines an `Age` structure and initializes two classes that have static fields of type `Age`.
trans-unit.target: 它定义`Age`结构，并初始化具有静态字段的类型的两个类`Age`。

trans-unit.source: The second class applies <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute> to pin the field's address.
trans-unit.target: 第二个类适用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute>固定该字段的地址。

trans-unit.source: A number of memory allocations are made before and after these two objects are instantiated and the garbage collector is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 之前和之后这两个对象实例化并调用垃圾回收器进行大量的内存分配。

trans-unit.source: The output from the example shows that although the address of the first `Age` field has changed after garbage collection, the address of the field to which <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute> is applied has not.
trans-unit.target: 示例输出显示，但第一个地址`Age`垃圾回收之后，向其字段的地址已更改字段<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.FixedAddressValueTypeAttribute>应用是否没有。
